title: removed or replaced toasts in PubnubPushService
message:
removed or replaced toasts in PubnubPushService

A service should not create toasts that might appear when the app is no longer.
Also we don't need to notify the user if everything works as it should.

So the toast on successful connection was removed and in case of an error
a notification is created.

title: Fix crash urls with backslash
message:
Fix crash urls with backslash

If an url is entered with backslashes instead of slashes the application crashes.
Alternative to the manual validation should be: Patterns.WEB_URL.matcher(potentialUrl).matches()

title: Fix crash urls with backslash
message:
Fix crash urls with backslash

If an url is entered with backslashes instead of slashes the application crashes.

title: Widget Service onStart Crash
message:
Widget Service onStart Crash

Since intents can be null, the onStart method can crash with a NullPointerException.
http://developer.android.com/reference/android/app/Service.html#onStart%28android.content.Intent,%20int%29

title: The service now keeps track of running AsyncTasks and cancels them in
message:
The service now keeps track of running AsyncTasks and cancels them in
these two cases:

1. When another AsyncTask filling the same adapter is started. Example:
In Checks Activity, another host is selected while an AsyncTask is still
loading data (applications and items) for the previous host. Both share
the same adapters, so the first task is cancelled to avoid the case
where one task overwrites the other task's data in the adapter.
2. When an activity is destroyed. Example: The Screens Activity is
destroyed before all graphs have been imported. As this is a very
time-consuming operation, it should be stopped.

title: Exception Handling:
message:
Exception Handling:
- if Zabbix authorization fails, one retry is performed
- for errors that cannot be handled internally, a broadcast is sent.
This broadcast is received by ExceptionBroadcastReceiver, which shows a
Toast containing the exception's message

message:

message:

message:

message:
